definition: New World fern having woolly cinnamon-colored spore-bearing fronds in early spring later surrounded by green fronds
details:
noun
- New World fern having woolly cinnamon-colored spore-bearing fronds in early spring later surrounded by green fronds
= synonyms: cinnamon fern
- tall fern of northern temperate regions having graceful arched fronds and sporophylls resembling ostrich plumes
= synonyms: ostrich fern, shuttlecock fern
